Effect: Aid (Critical Failure).name: Effect: Aid (Critical Failure)
Effect: Aid (Critical Failure).description: You gain a circumstance bonus to the aided check based on the result of your ally's Aid check.

Effect: Aid (Critical Success Legendary).name: Effect: Aid (Critical Success Legendary)
Effect: Aid (Critical Success Legendary).description: You gain a circumstance bonus to the aided check based on the result of your ally's Aid check.

Effect: Aid (Critical Success Master).name: Effect: Aid (Critical Success Master)
Effect: Aid (Critical Success Master).description: You gain a circumstance bonus to the aided check based on the result of your ally's Aid check.

Effect: Aid (Critical Success).name: Effect: Aid (Critical Success)
Effect: Aid (Critical Success).description: You gain a circumstance bonus to the aided check based on the result of your ally's Aid check.

Effect: Aid (Success).name: Effect: Aid (Success)
Effect: Aid (Success).description: You gain a circumstance bonus to the aided check based on the result of your ally's Aid check.

Spell Effect: Song of Strength (+2).name: Spell Effect: Song of Strength (+2)
Spell Effect: Song of Strength (+2).description: You gain a +2 status bonus to Athletics checks and DCs against Athletics skill actions such as Disarm, Reposition, Shove, and Trip.

Spell Effect: Song of Strength (+3).name: Spell Effect: Song of Strength (+3)
Spell Effect: Song of Strength (+3).description: You gain a +3 status bonus to Athletics checks and DCs against Athletics skill actions such as Disarm, Reposition, Shove, and Trip.
